headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Return code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return codes .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Return message. For details, see Appendix-Return codes .

fields.name: carriers
fields.description: List of carriers in the country or location.

fields.name: carrier_id
fields.description: Carrier ID. You can include it when creating an ad.

fields.name: in_use
fields.description: Whether the carrier can be used for targeting

fields.name: hni_id
fields.description: HNI (MCC/MNC) ID. A unique combination formed from the MNC (Mobile Network Code) and MCC (Mobile Country Code), to form a home network identity (HNI)

fields.name: in_use
fields.description: Whether the HNI ID can be used for targeting

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.
